input-field.name: status
input-field.label: Plugin Status
input-field.helpText: Is the overall Boxalino plugin active (global switch)?

input-field.name: domain
input-field.label: Domain
input-field.helpText: What is your domain (e.g.: www.myshop.com)? Used to options cookie information about session ID and visitor ID.

input-field.name: account
input-field.label: Account
input-field.helpText: Please request your account with credentials by contacting support@boxalino.com.

input-field.name: apiKey
input-field.label: API key
input-field.helpText: Please request your account with credentials by contacting support@boxalino.com.

input-field.name: apiSecret
input-field.label: API password
input-field.helpText: Please request your account with credentials by contacting support@boxalino.com.

input-field.name: index
input-field.label: Data Index
input-field.helpText: Is the account a development account or a production account?.

input-field.name: apiUrl
input-field.label: REST API Url
input-field.helpText: REST API Url is https://*domain*.bx-cloud.com/narrative/*account*/api/1 where *domain* is main/r-st depending on your instance context (production or staging); *account* is the account name for the channel

input-field.name: test
input-field.label: Test mode
input-field.helpText: The request will use test=false by default; The test property refers to the Boxalino Optimization configurations used (narratives, scenario, facets, etc)

input-field.name: returnFields
input-field.label: Returned Fields
input-field.helpText: Optional: Write here comma-separated names of fields in Boxalino response. Colon separate option: global (without language version), local (with language version)

input-field.name: trackingStatus
input-field.label: Tracker Status
input-field.helpText: Is the JavaScript tracker enabled?

input-field.name: entityIdField
input-field.label: ID Field Name
input-field.helpText: Optional: specify special field name for search and recommendation grouping.

input-field.name: overwriteChannelId
input-field.label: Overwrite Channel ID
input-field.helpText: If you want to use a different shop for this shop, please provide the shop ID you want to use instead. This will overwrite the shop ID in the request.

input-field.name: password
input-field.label: Password
input-field.helpText: Please request your account with credentials by contacting support@boxalino.com.

input-field.name: exportPublishConfig
input-field.label: Publish Configuration
input-field.helpText: Yes by default. Any changes in product/customers/transaction properties will be automatically validated. For safety, it is recommended to de-activate this option once in production to make sure no unwanted changes are automatically published. However, if not activated, changes in the configuration will not be considered until published otherwise and, in the case of property deletions, the data sync might fail until the changes are published. Publishing of the configuration can be done by re-activating this option and running a full data sync again, or by publishing the configuration directly in Boxalino Data Intelligence web-admin.

input-field.name: exportProductInclude
input-field.label: Products - Include Properties
input-field.helpText: Optional: list of product properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported except the ones defined as excluded properties (next parameter).

input-field.name: exportProductExclude
input-field.label: Products - Exclude Properties
input-field.helpText: Optional: list of product properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported, this field is ignored if the list of product properties to include is not empty.

input-field.name: productsExtraTable
input-field.label: Products - Extra Tables
input-field.helpText: Optional: list of additional tables related to the products entity, separated by ','; the tables are to be exported as they are.

input-field.name: exportProductImages
input-field.label: Export Products Image URL
input-field.helpText: Optional: Export image and thumbnail image URLs (not required if standard usage of search and recommendations, as the shop renders the images itself). If activated, makes export slower.

input-field.name: exportProductUrl
input-field.label: Export Products URL
input-field.helpText: Optional: Export product urls (not required if standard usage of search and recommendations, as the shop renders the url itself). If activated, makes export slower.

input-field.name: exportCustomerInclude
input-field.label: Customers - Include Properties
input-field.helpText: Optional: list of customer properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported except the ones defined as excluded properties (next parameter).

input-field.name: exportCustomerExclude
input-field.label: Customers - Exclude Properties
input-field.helpText: Optional: list of customer properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported, this field is ignored if the list of customer properties to include is not empty.

input-field.name: customersExtraTable
input-field.label: Customers - Extra Tables
input-field.helpText: Optional: list of additional tables related to the customers entity, separated by ','; the tables are to be exported as they are.

input-field.name: exportTransactionMode
input-field.label: Transactions Mode
input-field.helpText: Choose how the transaction should be exported. For Incremental, the exporter will only export the last month.

input-field.name: exportTransactionInclude
input-field.label: Transactions - Include Properties
input-field.helpText: Optional: list of transactions properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported except the ones defined as excluded properties (next parameter).

input-field.name: exportTransactionExclude
input-field.label: Transactions - Exclude Properties
input-field.helpText: Optional: list of transactions properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported, this field is ignored if the list of transactions/orders properties to include is not empty.

input-field.name: transactionsExtraTable
input-field.label: Transactions - Extra Tables
input-field.helpText: Optional: list of additional tables related to the transactions entity, separated by ','; the tables are to be exported as they are.

input-field.name: exportCronSchedule
input-field.label: Schedule Time (min)
input-field.helpText: Set the time in minutes for the delta export cron job to wait since the last full export cron job. This option needs to be set, if you use the delta export cron job regularly, otherwise the delta export will run while the full export is still processing. Usually 4 hours (240 minutes) should be good, but this depends on the size of your shop.

input-field.name: exportDeltaFrequency
input-field.label: Delta-Delta frequency (min)
input-field.helpText: Set the time in minutes for the minimum time interval between 2 deltas to allow a run.

input-field.name: exportTimeout
input-field.label: Timeout
input-field.helpText: Archive exporter timeout; It is used to stop your server from waiting a status from the processed archive;
